reuters.title: WESTERN INVESTMENT <WIR> SHARE OFFER UNDERWAY
reuters.body: Western Investment Real Estate Trust said an offering of 3,500,000 shares is underway at 19.875 dlrs each through underwriters led by Merrill Lynch and Co Inc <MER>, <Donaldson, Lufkin and Jenrette Securities Corp> and A.G. Edwards and Sons Inc <AGE>. Reuter 
